intro: Verticordia endlicheriana var. endlicheriana, commonly known as the blackleaf lilly pilly, is a flowering plant native to Western Australia. It is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and distinctive, urn-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink. The plant typically grows in sandy or gravelly soils and thrives in full sun to partial shade. It is a member of the family Epacridae and is known for its ornamental value in gardens. The leaves are dark green and glossy, adding visual interest throughout the year.
